value-group.caption: BOD Operation in Active Mode select
value-group.name: FUSE_ACTIVE

value.caption: Enabled with wake-up halted until BOD is ready
value.name: ENWAKE

value-group.caption: BOD Operation in Sleep Mode select
value-group.name: FUSE_SLEEP

value.caption: The CRC is performed on the entire Flash (boot, application code and application data section).
value.name: FLASH

value.caption: The CRC is performed on the boot section of Flash
value.name: BOOT

value.caption: The CRC is performed on the boot and application code section of Flash
value.name: BOOTAPP

value.caption: PDI on PDI pad, reset on alternative reset pad
value.name: PDIRST

value.caption: Stop BIST and go to BREAK state
value.name: BREAK

value.caption: Test failed, data from last address
value.name: FAILED0

value.caption: Interrupt disabled but input buffer enabled
value.name: INTDISABLE

value.caption: Out: PA4 In: PA0, PA1, PA2
value.name: DEFAULT

value.caption: Out: PA7 In: PC3, PC4, PC5
value.name: DEFAULT

value.caption: Out: PB3 In: PB0, PB1, PB2
value.name: DEFAULT

value.caption: Out: PA5 In: PC0, PC1, PC2
value.name: ALT1

value.name: DSTOP

value.name: DSBOTH

value.caption: Dual Slope PWM, overflow on BOTTOM
value.name: DSBOTTOM

value.name: CNT_HIGHLVL

value.caption: Count on prescaled clock. Event controls count direction. Up-count when event line is 0, down-count when event line is 1.
value.name: UPDOWN

value.caption: Count on prescaled clock. Event controls count direction. Up-count when event line is 0, down-count when event line is 1.
value.name: UPDOWN

value.name: RESTART_POSEDGE

value.name: RESTART_ANYEDGE

value.name: RESTART_HIGHLVL

value.name: BOTH

value.name: FRQPW

value.name: 4CYC

value.name: RECVTRANS

value.name: RESPONSE
